text: Swipe Labs (San Francisco, CA) — Seeking a Lead Designer who'd be design hire #1. We're looking for a jack of all trades (Visual, UX/UI, Interaction). We're heavy on animations, transitions. This is a founding-level opportunity (1% equity @56M valuation). If interested please reach out to Marwan Roushdy (CEO / Cofounder) — marwan@joinswipe.com
